about_the_game:
[Overview of the game]
Inside the building where you can hear the bleak wind
People get their act together.
"I was sleeping at home. What's going on?"
"Laughing, we're all going to die."
"Hey, you're going to die? What are you talking about?"

Oh my god!!!!!!!!!!!

"What... What was that just now?"
"There's a dead man over there..."

People who can't escape, who are trapped in enclosed spaces.
We have to work together to find and catch the culprit to live!!


[Game information]
It's a multiplayer game that can be played with simple manipulation!

Citizens need to find a killer, and Killer is a mafia game where you need to kill a citizen.
Each object in the game has hidden aids, mystery tools, and murder tool items.
After farming, you can use it for yourself or your opponent depending on the tool function.

As time goes by, we are given time to vote.
During voting hours, you can have conversations between players and vote for who you want to vote for. (Vote carefully!)


[Manipulating the game]
It's very simple.
Go to the direction key, and you can interact and use items with specific keys.
The control key can be set in the in-game control method.
